Package org.jtrim2.image

package org.jtrim2.image
Defines classes for storing information about images. These classes are used by the org.jtrim2.image.async package.

There are also some useful static helper methods in BufferedImages.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.jtrim2.image.async
    Contains classes for asynchronously retrieving images.
    org.jtrim2.image.transform
    Contains various image transformations, mostly to support TransformedImageDisplay.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BufferedImages
    Contains static utility methods for create new BufferedImages and retrieving some properties of them.
    ImageMetaData
    Defines a base class for the meta data of an image.
    ImageResult
    Defines an image which was retrieved from an external source.
    JavaIIOMetaData
    Defines the meta data of images retrieved using the ImageIO library of Java.
